snippet.textDisplay: It's the time guys!
snippet.textOriginal: It's the time guys!

snippet.textDisplay:
Blue Stinger has some of the most original setting for a game, a small island with a huge futuristic scientific complex all with residential area and happy go lucky Christmas music while you mow down hordes of monsters in the market area.

I remember liking this theme so much as a kid when my father was playing it, though he wouldn't let me play horror games.
snippet.textOriginal:
Blue Stinger has some of the most original setting for a game, a small island with a huge futuristic scientific complex all with residential area and happy go lucky Christmas music while you mow down hordes of monsters in the market area.

I remember liking this theme so much as a kid when my father was playing it, though he wouldn't let me play horror games.

snippet.textDisplay: Yep It's that time of the year fellows....Time to put on this song and enjoy christmas...
snippet.textOriginal: Yep It's that time of the year fellows....Time to put on this song and enjoy christmas...

snippet.textDisplay: Feels like a busy time in a shopping mall trying to snatch the latest deals! Love it!
snippet.textOriginal: Feels like a busy time in a shopping mall trying to snatch the latest deals! Love it!

snippet.textDisplay:
Merry Christmas and happy holidays! Let's join in the Happy Market Christmas Stamp Rally now! Walk all over the store! PenPen Tina! PenPen Sparky! Tako Pen Sneak! Toto Pen Buck! Collect all four stamps! If you collect all four stamps, you can purchase great items with a special discount on the second floor! Yay!!!

*after completion*
Congratulations! You have completed the stamp rally! Reach the elevator on the second floor! Let's join in this special discount!
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: Controls were clunky, game was a ripoff, but godamn I LOVED Blue Stinger.  This song will forever be burned into my memory.  I spent so much time in that damned shopping mall, grinding mobs to get enough money to buy GUNS and AMMO from vending machines!
snippet.textOriginal: Controls were clunky, game was a ripoff, but godamn I LOVED Blue Stinger.  This song will forever be burned into my memory.  I spent so much time in that damned shopping mall, grinding mobs to get enough money to buy GUNS and AMMO from vending machines!

snippet.textDisplay: Reminds me of when the family in Home Alone 2 runs through the airport.

snippet.textDisplay: I would L O L so hard if someone clipped that moment and used this song 😂
snippet.textOriginal: I would L O L so hard if someone clipped that moment and used this song 😂

snippet.textDisplay: I was eleven and I remember how blaringly loud and out of place this was in this game, and how much it creeped me out. Cheery ass Christmas music is a corpse littered supermall, wielding a lightsaber to clunkily lop limbs off of grotesque monstrosities.. Quirky and eerily wacky. Early dreamcast classic, at least in my eyes
snippet.textOriginal: I was eleven and I remember how blaringly loud and out of place this was in this game, and how much it creeped me out. Cheery ass Christmas music is a corpse littered supermall, wielding a lightsaber to clunkily lop limbs off of grotesque monstrosities.. Quirky and eerily wacky. Early dreamcast classic, at least in my eyes
